column4: The ATI website says the fglrx driver supports cards 8500 and above, I have a 9250 and it doesn't work.. can anyone help? The error says something about no device detected on PCI 3:2:1 but in xorg.conf I have it set to PCI 3:2:0..
Ok well uh, how do I remove this? :|
try to install it through apt-get install fglrx
But I need to remove the one installed with the .run file first no?
